com.github.fge.largetext

Class LargeText

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.largetext.LargeText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, CharSequence

    public final class LargeText
extends Object
implements CharSequence, Closeable
    A large text file as a CharSequence

    Do not create an instance of this class directly; instead, use a LargeTextFactory.

    Important note! This class implements Closeable (and therefore AutoCloseable); the recommended use is therefore to use it in a try-with-resources statement:

         try (
         final LargeText largeText = factory.fromPath(somePath);
     ) {
         // use "largeText" here
     }

    Failing to close the instance correctly means you leak a file descriptor to the text file you are using!

    See Also:
    LargeTextFactory

      • close

        public void close()
           throws IOException
        Close this instance

        This closes the embedded TextDecoder, and then the FileChannel associated with the file.

        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Throws:
        IOException - see TextDecoder.close() and AbstractInterruptibleChannel.close()
